meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, they were eulogising the hero for his bravery.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys eulogising her favorite books to her friends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was eulogising the delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work eulogises the beauty of nature in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The teacher eulogised the student's exceptional performance in front of the class.

meanings.definition: The act of praising someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her eulogising of the singer's talent was heartfelt.
meanings.sent2: The eulogising of the historical figure was moving.
meanings.sent3: The eulogising of the new ice cream flavor made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The eulogising of the sunset painted a beautiful picture in words.
meanings.sent5: His eulogising of his favorite team's victory was contagious.
